statements: SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Pharmacies WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT pharmacy_id, pharmacy_name FROM Pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Pharmacies
SELECT pharmacy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inventory FROM Pharmacies GROUP BY pharmacy_name HAVING total_inventory > 10
SELECT * FROM Pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id = 1;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id > 3 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, COUNT(medication_inventory) AS inventory_count FROM Pharmacies GROUP BY pharmacy_name HAVING COUNT(medication_inventory) > 0;
SELECT * FROM Pharmacies WHERE location LIKE '%New%' AND medication_inventory ->> 'type' = 'painkiller';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location, jsonb_array_elements_text(medication_inventory -> 'types') AS medication_type FROM Pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id < 5 ORDER BY pharmacy_name ASC, medication_type DESC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE prescription_required = TRUE;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT pharmacy_id, pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE prescription_required = TRUE;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE dosage >= '100mg' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY pharmacy_name ASC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Pharmacies JOIN Medications ON pharmacy_id = medication_id WHERE prescription_required = FALSE ORDER BY pharmacy_name DESC, medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT name, dosage FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, interaction_description FROM interactions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name FROM medications WHERE dosage <= 10;
SELECT email, age FROM patients WHERE age >= 18 AND age <= 30;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT name, dosage FROM medications WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND dosage BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT p.name, p.age, m.name AS medication_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN medications m ON p.id = m.id;

SELECT i.interaction_description, m1.name AS medication1, m2.name AS medication2 FROM interactions i INNER JOIN medications m1 ON i.medication1_id = m1.id INNER JOIN medications m2 ON i.medication2_id = m2.id WHERE i.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Pharmacies;
SELECT pharmacy_id, pharmacy_name FROM Pharmacies ORDER BY pharmacy_id DESC;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id = 3;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, quantity FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT medication_id_1, medication_id_2, interaction_description FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pharmacies;
SELECT pharmacy_id, pharmacy_name FROM Pharmacies ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, quantity FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 100;

SELECT i.interaction_id, m1.medication_name AS medication_1, m2.medication_name AS medication_2, i.interaction_description AS description FROM Interactions i JOIN Medications m1 ON i.medication_id_1 = m1.medication_id JOIN Medications m2 ON i.medication_id_2 = m2.medication_id;

SELECT ps.safety_id, m.medication_name, p.patient_id, ps.issue_description FROM PatientSafety ps JOIN Medications m ON ps.medication_id = m.medication_id JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM PatientSafety) p ON ps.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY ps.safety_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pharmacy;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacy ORDER BY pharmacy_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medication WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg';
SELECT dispense_id, dispense_date, quantity FROM Dispensing ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pharmacy WHERE pharmacy_id = 1;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM Pharmacy WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medication WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;

SELECT Dispensing.dispense_id, Pharmacy.pharmacy_name, Patient.patient_name, Medication.medication_name FROM Dispensing JOIN Pharmacy ON Dispensing.pharmacy_id = Pharmacy.pharmacy_id JOIN Patient ON Dispensing.patient_id = Patient.patient_id JOIN Medication ON Dispensing.medication_id = Medication.medication_id;
